TopicTitle: Annoying navball in mapview closing every time I am going in and out of the map view

Articles.Content:
When I am opening the nav ball in map view it is closing itself when i go out of the map view. So When I open the map view again I have to bring up the nav ball again. Its super annoying!!! How do i enable the nav ball so that it doesen't close itself when i exit the map view??

Sorry for bad grammar and spelling!

And yes, I am a new to KSP!! And so far i love it!!!

 

Merry Kerbmas!

And a happy new year filled with exciting missions!!!
It's in the options, I think "gameplay" Option to automatically hide nav ball, just turn it off.

2 minutes ago, SpacedCowboy said:

It's in the options, I think "gameplay" Option to automatically hide nav ball, just turn it off.

Thank you so much!!

Sadly it's a binary option. Either it's always up when you go in or always down. There is no "remember what I had it set to the last time" option.

That said, the way it is now is far better than it was before 1.2.

Yeah, I have no problem with it being there all the time. Just shrink it a little bit and move it over to your favorite position.

Oddly, no one ever asks me " how's your nav ball hangin''?
